import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket activity"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/activities/{ticketActivityId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing ticket activity, such as editing a comment, correcting information in a note, or modifying activity metadata. Only certain activity types (primarily comments and notes) can be edited; system-generated activities like status changes cannot be modified.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **ticketActivityId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) to find the activity and extract `TicketActivityId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. View timeline: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) → identify activity to edit
2. Get details: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-activity-by-id)
3. Update: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-activity) with modified content
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) to confirm changes

**Request Body**: Provide updated activity data including `Body` (content), `IsPrivate` (visibility), and other editable fields.

**Note**: Editing an activity preserves the original creation timestamp but may record an edit history for audit purposes.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-activity-by-id) – View activity details
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-ticket-activity) – Delete activity instead
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) – View activity history

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"ticketActivityId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the activity to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated activity details","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents an activity or comment on a ticket.","properties":{"TicketActivityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the activity."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier.","nullable":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was last modified."},"IsPublic":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity is visible to end users."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity has been soft-deleted."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the ticket. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets), extract `Items[].TicketId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"TicketSubject":{"type":"string","description":"Subject of the parent ticket.","nullable":true},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who created the activity.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"OwnerDetails":{"type":"string","description":"Quick reference display name for the owner.","nullable":true},"ActivityItems":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of polymorphic items making up the activity content.","items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"description":"Polymorphic activity item. Fields vary by activity type."},"nullable":true},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Sort order index."},"Alignment":{"type":"string","description":"UI alignment preference.","nullable":true}},"title":"TicketActivity"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
